scripts.start: npm run build && npx serve out
scripts.verify-build:
echo "Verifying build output..." && echo "
Main HTML files:" && ls -la out/*.html 2>/dev/null && echo "
Static assets (total size):" && du -sh out/_next/static/ && echo "
Static assets breakdown:" && du -sh out/_next/static/* && echo "
Total static files:" && find out/_next/static -type f | wc -l && echo "
Build verification complete - all assets present!"
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run verify-build
scripts.deploy: echo "" > out/.nojekyll && echo "joeyzhou.com" > out/CNAME && npx gh-pages -d out --dotfiles
scripts.postdeploy: echo "Deployment completed! Assets deployed from the same build as npm start"
